text:
Looking at this historical German letter, I can identify the following information:

```json
{
    "letter_title": ["Betr. 'ALBATROS'"],
    "send_date": ["1925-07-13"],
    "sender_persons": ["null"],
    "receiver_persons": ["null"]
}
```

The letter has a subject line "Betr. 'ALBATROS'" (Re: 'ALBATROS'), and the date "13. Juli 1925" (July 13, 1925) is clearly visible at the top. While there is a signature at the bottom and an address block at the top (mentioning "Elektrizit√§tswerk Basel"), the specific names of the sender and receiver are not clearly legible in the document.
